sys_ux_data_broker_rest.name: Get CMDB Relationships
sys_ux_data_broker_rest.props: [ { "name": "sys_id", "label": "SysId", "description": "CI SysId", "readOnly": false, "mandatory": true, "defaultValue": "" }, { "name": "load_type", "label": "Data load type", "description": "tree or flat", "readOnly": false, "mandatory": true, "defaultValue": "" }, { "name": "level", "label": "Relationship Max Level", "description": "How many levels to search when looking at nested relationships", "readOnly": false, "mandatory": false, "defaultValue": "" } ]
